# Getting Data

## Load libraries

```{r}
# load libs
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(rnaturalearth)
```

## Get ZA

```{r}
# get natural earth data
land <- ne_countries(
  continent = "africa",
  scale = "small",
  returnclass = "sf"
)

# save
st_write(land, "data/za_boundary.gpkg", append = F)
```
